pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.20GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: HD4400
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
